alert.note: Alert for Denali (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 21 at 2:19PM AKST until December 23 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM WEDNESDAY TO 3 PM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Plan on slippery road conditions. In addition, areas of poor visibility are expected. Tree branches could fall as well. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 11 inches are expected. * WHERE...Along the Parks Highway. * WHEN...3 PM Wednesday to 3 PM Thursday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Look for reduced visibilities at times in snow and blowing snow. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for snow and blowing snow means periods of snow and blowing snow will cause travel difficulties. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
